Workflows.Workflow: Select 'Select D.sbs_no as fldSBS, D.sid As fldDocSID, D.doc_no As fldDocNumber, D.post_date as fldDocDate, D.bt_cuid as fldCustomerSID, case when LPAD(D.store_no,3,''0'')=''001'' then ''003'' end as fldStore, case when D.has_sale=1 then 1 else 0 end as fldDocType, #case when coalesce(i.PROC_STATUS,0)=0 then 0 when i.PROC_STATUS=131072 then 3 when i.PROC_STATUS=65536 then 2 else -1 end as fldDocStatus, coalesce((Select round(sum(amount),2) As fldTotalCash From rpsods.tender TCash Where D.sid=TCash.doc_sid and TCash.tender_type=0),0) as fldTotalCash, coalesce((Select round(sum(amount),2) As fldTotalCard From rpsods.tender TCash Where D.sid=TCash.doc_sid and TCash.tender_type=2),0) as fldTotalCard, coalesce((Select round(sum(amount),2) As fldTotalOther From rpsods.tender TCash Where D.sid=TCash.doc_sid and TCash.tender_type not in (0,2,5)),0) as fldTotalOther, coalesce((Select round(sum(amount),2) As fldBonus From rpsods.tender TCash Where D.sid=TCash.doc_sid and TCash.tender_type =5),0) as fldBonus, I.item_pos As fldSeqNum, (Select GROUP_CONCAT(card_type_name) From (Select ''Наличные'' As card_type_name From rpsods.tender TCash Where D.sid=TCash.doc_sid and TCash.tender_type=0 union Select ''Бонусы'' As card_type_name From rpsods.tender TCash Where D.sid=TCash.doc_sid and TCash.tender_type=5 union Select distinct TCred.card_type_name From rpsods.tender T left join rpsods.tender_credit_card TCred On T.sid = TCred.tender_sid Where D.sid=T.doc_sid and T.tender_type=2 ) A223) As fldCard_type, I.sid as fldItemSID, I.scan_upc as fldUPC, Round(I.qty,0) as fldDocItmQty, Round(I.price,2) as fldDocItmPrice, Round(I.tax_perc,0) as fldVATprc, Round(I.cost,2) as fldDocItmCost, D.cashier_full_name as fldCashier, D.bt_last_name as fldClient, D.bt_first_name as fldClient_name, D.bt_primary_phone_no as fldphone, D.reason_code as fldReason, #D.reason_description I.so_number as fldPO_NUM, '''' as fldDelvry From rpsods.document D inner join rpsods.document_item I On D.sid= I.doc_sid Where D.post_date >= Date_Add(sysdate(), interval -7 day) and D.doc_no > 0 and (D.has_sale=1 or D.has_return=1)' As QUERY, 'D:\\Vremena\\invoices.dat' As FILE_PATH, 'True' As "APPEND", '\\t' As COL_SPAN, '\\r\\n' As ROW_SPAN

select 'select case when s.store_no=1 then ''5010'' end as fldSBS, c0.sid as fldclientSID, c0.cust_id as fld_cust_id, case when c0.last_name is null then null else c0.last_name end as fldClient, case when c0.first_name is null then null else c0.first_name end as fldClient_name, c3.phone_no as fldphone from customer c0 inner join store s On c0.store_sid = s.sid inner join customer_address ca on c0.SID = ca.CUST_SID inner join customer_phone c3 on c3.cust_sid = ca.cust_sid where c3.phone_no like ''%+7%'' and c0.post_DATE >= DATE_FORMAT(Date_Add(sysdate(), interval -7 day), ''%Y-%m-01'') order by fldSBS, fldclientSID, fld_cust_id, fldClient, fldClient_name, fldphone' As QUERY, 'D:\\Vremena\\clients.dat' As FILE_PATH, 'True' As "APPEND",'\\t' As COL_SPAN, '\\r\\n' As ROW_SPAN

select 'select v.vend_code as "fldVendorCode", v.vend_name as "fldCompany", va.postal_code as "fldZip", va.address_1 as "fldAddr1", va.address_2 as "fldAddr2", va.address_3 as "fldAddr3", vc.phone1_no as "fldPhone1", vc.phone2_no as "fldPhone2", vc.first_name as "fldFName", vc.last_name as "fldLName" from VENDOR v inner join vendor_contact_address va on v.sid=va.vend_sid left join vendor_contact vc on v.sid = vc.sid' As QUERY, 'D:\\Vremena\\vendors.dat'As FILE_PATH, 'True' As "APPEND", '\\t' As COL_SPAN, '\\r\\n' As ROW_SPAN
